turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, my new smart toaster oven isn't working. I plugged it in, and the display is blank. I've tried everything!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I'm sorry to hear you're having trouble with your new smart toaster oven. Let's troubleshoot this. First, can you confirm that the power outlet is functioning correctly? Have you tried plugging another device into the same outlet to see if it works?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Yes, the outlet works! I've tried another device. I've also checked the breaker. Seriously, I'm getting pretty frustrated here. Is there even a power button on this thing?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. According to the manual, there isn't a physical power button. The device should turn on automatically when plugged in. Can you try unplugging the toaster oven for at least 60 seconds and then plugging it back in? Sometimes this can reset the internal systems.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, I tried that, and still nothing. The display is completely dead. This is supposed to be a high-end appliance. Now what? Is there a known issue with this model? And if so, what's the fix?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I am sorry, I do not have access to known issues with this model. It seems like the appliance is defective. I recommend you contact the manufacturer's customer support line for a warranty claim. They can provide specific troubleshooting steps or arrange for a repair or replacement.
